asset.author: Petco
asset.hookText:
Subscribe to our channel:
http://bit.ly/12dY9oO

Here are some things you should consider when you're adopting a dog.

To help ensure a lasting relationship you'll need to choose the right dog for your family. 

Can you afford it?

Do you have enough time?

Research dog personalities.

Consider dog size and energy level.

Will the dog get along with kids and other pets?

Puppies require a lot of time and supervision.

Consider adopting an adult dog.

If you are considering adoption we recommend: http://www.petfinder.com
